TypeSignature.Value: public sealed class BindableTemplateBuilder : System.Web.UI.TemplateBuilder, System.Web.UI.IBindableTemplate
.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit BindableTemplateBuilder extends System.Web.UI.TemplateBuilder implements class System.Web.UI.IBindableTemplate, class System.Web.UI.ITemplate
Public NotInheritable Class BindableTemplateBuilder Inherits TemplateBuilder Implements IBindableTemplate
public ref class BindableTemplateBuilder sealed : System::Web::UI::TemplateBuilder, System::Web::UI::IBindableTemplate

summary.span: 支援於樣板化內容區段中自動繫結至 ASP.NET 資料來源控制項之資料繫結控制項的頁面剖析。

span.span: Supports page parsing of data-bound controls that automatically bind to an ASP.NET data source control within templated content sections.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別用於在設計階段和編譯網頁中支援擷取資料繫結範本中的雙向繫結的控制項屬性的值。The class is used in design-time and in no-compile pages to support extracting the values of two-way bound control properties in a data-bound template. 物件產生的程式碼實作範本的方法。The object generates the code that implements the method for the template. 是包含範本內容的資料繫結控制項。The is a for data-bound controls that include templated content. 如果在設計階段或在無編譯的頁面中，使用資料繫結控制項，則介面上用來剖析雙向樣板化控制項中資料繫結。If the data-bound control is used in design-time or in a no-compile page, the interface on the is used to parse the two-way data-binding within the templated control. 如果編譯資料繫結控制項，執行個體類別會建立並指派值給物件。If the data-bound control is compiled, an instance of the class is created and assigned to the value of the object. 如需有關 ASP.NET 資料繫結、 運算式和語法的詳細資訊，請參閱[繫結至資料庫](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742)和[資料繫結運算式概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/14cdd57d-0f82-4667-b503-73e1a96f136a)。For more information about ASP.NET data binding, expressions, and syntax, see [Binding to Databases](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742) and [Data-Binding Expressions Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/14cdd57d-0f82-4667-b503-73e1a96f136a).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary ExtractValues(class System.Web.UI.Control container) cil managed
Public Function ExtractValues (container As Control) As IOrderedDictionary

param.name: container
param.span: 可從中取出名稱/值組的 。在雙向的資料繫結狀況下，資料繫結控制項會將這些名稱/值組傳遞給相關的資料來源控制項。

span.span: The from which to extract name/value pairs, which are passed by the data-bound control to an associated data source control in two-way data-binding scenarios.

summary.span: 在設計階段和無編譯頁面上，擷取樣板化內容中使用雙向 ASP.NET 資料繫結語法所繫結值的一組名稱/值組。

span.span: Retrieves a set of name/value pairs for values that are bound using two-way ASP.NET data-binding syntax within the templated content at design-time and in no-compile pages.

returns.span: 名稱/值組的 ，其中名稱表示樣板化內容中指定為第一個要繫結之參數的資料項目欄位，值則是使用雙向 ASP.NET 資料繫結語法所繫結之屬性值目前的值。

span.span: An of name/value pairs, where the name represents the data item field specified as the first parameter to bind within the templated content and the value is the current value of a property value bound using two-way ASP.NET data-binding syntax.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法類別實作方法。The method is the class implementation of the method.

param.name: parentBuilder
param.span: 要將目前產生器加入的 。

span.span: The to which to add the current builder.

summary.span: 告知 物件，它正加入至父控制項產生器中。

span.span: Notifies the object that it is being added to a parent control builder.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果資料繫結控制項包含可支援雙向資料繫結，樣板化內容方法，除了呼叫基底類別方法，也會建立的執行個體委派。If the data-bound control includes templated content that support two-way data-binding, the method, in addition to calling the method of the base class, also creates an instance of the delegate.
